meanings.definition: A person or organization that provides financial or other support for a person, activity, or organization.
meanings.sent1: The sponsors of the school fundraiser donated money to help buy new books for the library.
meanings.sent2: The sponsors of the sports team helped cover the cost of uniforms and equipment.
meanings.sent3: The sponsors of the charity event made sure everyone had enough cookies to go around.
meanings.sent4: The sponsors of the concert were like fairy godmothers, making the event magical with their support.
meanings.sent5: The sponsors of the art exhibition made the colorful paintings possible with their generous donations.

meanings.definition: To act as a sponsor for; support or finance.
meanings.sent1: She sponsors a child in need, providing monthly financial assistance for their education.
meanings.sent2: The company sponsors local events to give back to the community.
meanings.sent3: He sponsors his friend's crazy ideas even though they sometimes don't make sense.
meanings.sent4: The company sponsors the development of new technologies, pushing innovation forward.
meanings.sent5: The organization sponsors a clean-up day to support environmental conservation efforts.
